00024         // Call the Model constructor

00043     /**
00044      * Devuelve todos los registros en base de datos
00045      *
00046      * @return User_Data array
00047      *
00048      * (non-PHPdoc)
00049      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#fetchAll()
00050      */
00051     public function fetchAll()
00052     {
00053         
00054         $data = $this->_ci->db->get('user')->result_array();
00055         $items = array();
00056 
00057         foreach ($data as $item) {
00058             $items[] = new User_Data($item);
00059         }
00060 
00061         return $items;
00062     }

00064     /**
00065      * Método para realizar busquedas en la tabla user
00066      *
00067      * @param array $where | User_Data $where
00068      * @param integer $limit
00069      * @param integer $offset
00070      * @param boolean $escape
00071      * @return User_Data array
00072      *
00073      * (non-PHPdoc)
00074      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#find()
00075      */
00076     public function find($where = array(), $limit = false, $offset = false, $escape = true)
00077     {
00078         if ($where instanceof User_Data) {
00079 
00080             $where = $where->getExistingOptions();
00081             unset($where["Errors"]);
00082         }
00083 
00084         $this->_ci->db->select("*");
00085         $this->_ci->db->from("user");
00086 
00087         if (count($where) > 0) {
00088 
00089             if ($escape) {
00090 
00091                 $this->_ci->db->where($where);
00092 
00093             } else {
00094 
00095                 foreach ($where as $key => $val) {
00096 
00097                     $this->_ci->db->where($key, $val, false);
00098                 }
00099             }
00100         }
00101  
00102         if ($limit and $offset) {
00103 
00104             $this->_ci->db->limit($limit, $offset);
00105 
00106         } else if ($limit) {
00107 
00108             $this->_ci->db->limit($limit);
00109         }
00110 
00111         $data = $this->_ci->db->get()->result_array();
00112         $items = array();
00113 
00114         foreach ($data as $item) {
00115             $items[] = new User_Data($item);
00116         }
00117 
00118         return $items;
00119     }

00131     public function totalRows($where = array(), $escape = true)
00132     {
00133 
00134         $this->_ci->db->from('user');
00135         if (count($where) > 0) {
00136 
00137             if ($escape) {
00138 
00139                 $this->_ci->db->where($where);
00140 
00141             } else {
00142 
00143                 foreach ($where as $key => $val) {
00144 
00145                     $this->_ci->db->where($key, $val, false);
00146                 }
00147             }
00148         }
00149 
00150         //$results =
00151         return $this->_ci->db->get()->num_rows();
00152     }

00154     /**
00155      * Crea o actualiza un registro en base de datos
00156      *
00157      * @param User_Data $messages
00158      * @return bool | User_Data $column
00159      * (non-PHPdoc)
00160      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#save()
00161      */
00162     public function save(User_Data $user = null)
00163     {
00164         if (!$user instanceof User_Data) {
00165 
00166             throw new Exception('User_Data object required');
00167         }
00168 
00169         if (!$user->isValid()) {
00170 
00171              throw new Exception('User object is not valid');
00172         }
00173 
00174         $data = array(
00175             'id' => $user->getId(),
00176             'userName' => $user->getUserName(),
00177             'password' => $user->getPassword(),
00178             'email' => $user->getEmail(),
00179             'activated' => $user->getActivated(),
00180             'activationCode' => $user->getActivationCode(),
00181             'forgottenPasswordCode' => $user->getForgottenPasswordCode(),
00182             'deleteAccountCode' => $user->getDeleteAccountCode(),
00183             'lastVisit' => $user->getLastVisit(),
00184             'created' => $user->getCreated(),
00185         );
00186 
00187         if (null === ($id = $user->getId())) {
00188 
00189             unset($data['id']);
00190             $this->_ci->db->set($data);
00191             $this->_ci->db->insert('user');
00192 
00193         } else {
00194 
00195             $this->_ci->db->where('id', $data['id']);
00196             unset($data['id']);
00197             $this->_ci->db->set($data);
00198             $this->_ci->db->update('user');
00199         }
00200 
00201         return $this->_ci->db->insert_id();
00202     }
00203 
00204     /**
00205      * Elimina registros en base de datos
00206      *
00207      * @param array $where
00208      * @return bool
00209      *
00210      * (non-PHPdoc)
00211      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#delete()
00212      */
00213     public function delete($where = array())
00214     {
00215         if ($where instanceof User_Data) {
00216 
00217             $where = array("id" => $where->getId());
00218         }
00219 
00220         $this->_ci->db->where($where);
00221         $this->_ci->db->delete('user');
00222         return true;
00223     }
